definition: Portugal/Portuguese/abbr. for 葡萄牙[Pu2 tao2 ya2]
sour grapes (set expr. based on Aesop)/lit. to say grapes are sour when you can't eat them
pinyin: chi1 bu4 dao4 pu2 tao5 shuo1 pu2 tao5 suan1

definition: sour grapes (set expr. based on Aesop)/lit. to say grapes are sour when you can't eat them
pinyin: chi1 bu4 dao4 pu2 tao5 shuo1 pu2 tao5 suan1

sentences.english: Wash grapes overnight after don't hire small fly.
sentences.chinese: 洗葡萄隔夜后不招小飞虫。

sentences.english: The Rapel Valley weather ripened fruit slowly , and Cabernet Sauvignon developed intense flavours.
sentences.chinese: 兰佩谷的气候使得葡萄成熟缓慢，并带有浓郁的香气。

sentences.english: And two long glasses brimmed with muscatel Bubble upon the table.
sentences.chinese: 桌上两个长脚玻璃盅注满了麝香葡萄酒，泛着泡沫。

sentences.english: They had pears in white wine, with a piece of fruitcake.
sentences.chinese: 他们吃着白葡萄酒腌泡过的梨子，配着水果蛋糕。

sentences.english: The unrefined Veratryl alcohol extracted from fresh grape peel by organic solvent could significantly enhance Lip activity.
sentences.chinese: 有机萃取葡萄皮渣粗提藜芦醇可提高酶活。

sentences.english: Invasive molar pregnancy is extremely rare, but is one of te pre-cancer stage for choriocarcinoma .
sentences.chinese: 侵袭性葡萄胎非常罕见，但却是绒癌的一种癌前病变。

sentences.english: From a small Spanish province called La Rioja come HUARTE wines.
sentences.chinese: 来自西班牙里奥哈地区的HUARTE葡萄酒。

sentences.english: That is, to bear the fruit the vine wishes to bring forth.
sentences.chinese: 这个目标就是要结出葡萄树想要结的果子来。

sentences.english: Catechin is a phenol antioxidant found in grape seeds.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄籽中含有的儿茶素是一种酚类抗氧化剂。

sentences.english: That's for mechanical harvesting-the grape growers'way of beating the unions.
sentences.chinese: 这是为了便于机械收割，是葡萄园主对付工会的办法。

sentences.english: Be known as " cork is regnal " Portuguese the cork that already had hundred years is produced history.
sentences.chinese: 被誉为“软木王国”的葡萄牙已有百年的软木生产史。

sentences.english: Yes, I have a bottle of Chablis.
In the South-East part of the complex there was a wine presser.
sentences.chinese: 遗迹的西南部是一个葡萄酒加工厂。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a method for the determination of alcohol residue in enoxacin gluconate by GC.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立葡萄糖酸依诺沙星中乙醇残留量的测定方法。

sentences.english: Some years Non-Vintage can be more fun.
sentences.chinese: 一些年头，非葡萄酒酿造会更有趣。

sentences.english: In Xinjiang, the courtyard of almost every home has a grape trellis.
sentences.chinese: 在新疆，几乎每家的院子里都有葡萄架。

definition: Hami melon (a variety of muskmelon)/honeydew melon/cantaloupe
red pitaya/dragon fruit/dragon pearl fruit (genus Hylocereus)
